best_practices: Always reference the official color hex codes for accuracy
Use font fallbacks when custom fonts aren't available
Apply accent colors sparingly for visual hierarchy
anti_patterns: Don't guess color values - always use specified hex codes
Avoid using all accent colors at once - maintain balance
Don't override brand guidelines with custom styling

faq.question: Are these the official Anthropic brand colors?
faq.answer: Yes, these are Anthropic's official brand colors and typography specifications.

faq.question: Do I need to install special fonts?
faq.answer: Poppins and Lora fonts should be pre-installed for best results, with Arial/Georgia fallbacks available.

faq.question: Can I use these guidelines for external projects?
faq.answer: These guidelines are provided for creating artifacts that benefit from Anthropic's look and feel.

faq.question: What if my system doesn't have the specified fonts?
faq.answer: The skill includes fallback fonts: Arial for headings and Georgia for body text.

faq.question: How do I apply these colors in practice?
faq.answer: Use the provided hex codes with your design tools or reference them when creating styled artifacts.

faq.question: Are there usage restrictions for these brand elements?
faq.answer: Follow standard brand guidelines - use colors appropriately and maintain visual consistency.
